channel.title: CVE Feed for Kubernetes -- Kubernetes Java Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kubernetes -- Kubernetes Java Client

item.title: CVE-2020-8570|2024-08-04T10:03:46.133Z -- kubernetes -- kubernetes%20java%20client
item.description: Kubernetes Java client libraries in version 10.0.0 and versions prior to 9.0.1 allow writes to paths outside of the current directory when copying multiple files from a remote pod which sends a maliciously crafted archive. This can potentially overwrite any files on the system of the process executing the client code.
